description: Non-material amendment application pursuant to conditions 16 (Rainwater Butts) and 34 (Refuse/Recycling Enclosure) of planning consent ref: P2016/0391/S73. The proposed amendment is to allow for the phased delivery of the development.
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: The wording of Condition 16 (Rainwater Butts) attached to planning permission P2016/0391/S73 dated 19 May 2016 should now read as:

CONDITION: Details of rainwater butts and composting facilities shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior any superstructure works commencing onsite. The details as approved shall be brought into use prior to the first occupation of the building to which they form part of and retained as such permanently thereafter. 

REASON: To ensure the sustainable use of water and in accordance with sustainability policy.
site_name: Ball'S Pond Road Verge Formerly Known As 193-229
